name: Paper Druids
description:
In one world, you are a group of druids defending a grove from trespassers. Nature's wrath shall come upon those who do not belong; from their corpses, the earth shall spring anew.

In another, you're a group of friends on a lonely winter evening, having decided to have some fun with some graph paper and pens.

How long can you defend this grove?

!!! The game appears to be currently broken when running on Macintosh computers. We are working on a fix. !!!

Game Core

You start the game controlling three Druid units. Each unit under your control can move and shoot. Every turn, you can seed Sprouts, which require fertilizer. Luckily for you, a lovely batch of fertilizer is currently invading your front lawn.

Fertilized Sprouts grow into Plants. Plants arranged in specific patterns can be harvested to get different units.

The game ends when you have lost all units. Try to get the highest score you can!

Controls

  • LEFT MOUSE BUTTON for pretty much all actions.
  • RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON to cancel actions.
  • Hover over units to read about them.

Made by ovrbi, ruby, BirbMom and Finn Talisker in 72 hours for LudumDare 52.
